title: Interpretation of a dream about itching

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing itching in a dream, there are many symbols of itching in a dream, some of which indicate happiness and kindness and some of which indicate fear and anxiety, depending on the place of the itching and the person who saw the dream. Bleeding in a dream from excessive itching indicates the removal of some worries and sorrows from the person who saw the vision and enjoyment and pleasure of itching on his back, as it indicates the presence of benefit or money from a relative or friend. Interpretation of the modern school of vision itching The modern Western school interpreted itching and itching in a dream due to a disease such as scabies as a good vision, indicating the good condition of the seer and indicating jealousy and suspicion. If a woman dreams of itching and itching, this means that she suspects that another woman is controlling her life. Seeing itching and itching in the back in a dream Seeing yourself scratching your back in a dream is evidence of the bond, which is the person associated with the visionary, whom the dreamer can rely on in adversity and adversity. Seeing a scratched back reflects the dreamer's fears or anxiety about a friend or relative. Seeing severe and continuous itching and scratching the back indicates that the dreamer will distance himself from a relative or friend, or rebuke and blame them for what Among them. Seeing severe itching and itching in the back, accompanied by blood from repeated friction, indicates the cessation of worries and problems. If a person dreams that he is enjoying and enjoying scratching and rubbing his back in a dream, this is evidence that the dreamer will receive benefit or money from a relative or friend. If one dreams that he is rubbing the back of others, this means benefit for each other in money or knowledge. If a person dreams that he is rubbing the back of a ruler or leader, this is a sign of his help in the future. Seeing itchy hands in a dream Seeing itching and scratching on the hand in a dream, especially in the right hand, means earning money, while the left indicates taking out money, paying or losing. Itching in the right hand means that the desire is granted to the dreamer. Seeing the palm of the hand being scratched and rubbed strongly and forcefully is a great harbinger of sustenance, safety and security in food, clothing and shelter, and a blessing in life and life. I dream of scratching my head and hair Seeing hair in a dream indicates fears and problems, and seeing itching and scratching in the head or hair is evidence of the cessation of worries and problems. Seeing scratching the head indicates a lot of doubt and suspicion, it indicates intelligence and good management , or the idea of ​​appointing a fortune teller in a matter, or solving one's crises, or paying off one's debts. The best dream in hair is removing lice from the hair of the head, as it brings good news, wealth and luck. Seeing itching and scratches for individuals If an unmarried girl sees severe itching and scratching in her dream, this is good news. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is suffering from itching all over her body, this is good news and a desire to satisfy a desire such as marriage, travel or success. Seeing an individual itch strongly reflects security, stability and balance, as well as compatibility with the lover and dealing with the family. Seeing itching and itching for a married woman If a married woman dreams of itching and scratching, this indicates stability and harmony between her and her husband.

title: Interpretation of a circle in a dream: Seeing circles in a dream

preview.html: The concept of circular shapes, circular tools, and more. The circular geometric shape is the only shape that symbolizes perfection and is considered the only shape that has no sides. Scholars and commentators have said that the circle symbolizes the world or can refer to a woman and the circle can indicate days, years or months in the sense of indicating To movement and alternating days. The circle sometimes indicates a year filled with the fulfillment of many desires and dreams. The circle indicates safety, protection, and immunity. The circle in a man’s dream can symbolize a wife, home, or life. Seeing the circle in one dream. In an unmarried girl’s dream, seeing the circle is considered a strong indicator of the beginning of a new stage and the end of a stage. A precedent, which means that it could be a harbinger of marriage or a happy ending and a valuable dream that comes true for her after patience, effort and struggle. It is not necessary to see the circle in the form of a drawing, but you may see the circle in the form of a clock or any other object that appears in the dream in the form of a circle. Therefore, seeing a clock in the shape of a circle indicates and heralds the beginning of a new phase of his life. Seeing a circular shape in a public or private place, for example, such as seeing a room in a circular shape, or a garden, hall, or field, for example, means Safety, protection, and care. Seeing a circle in a married woman’s dreamAs for a married woman seeing a circular shape in a dream, this generally symbolizes completion, that is, the completion and completion of something or the achievement of some achievement. Practical: Seeing a circle in a pregnant woman’s dream: As for a pregnant woman who sees her period in her dream, this is an indication of the end of the pregnancy period or the end of a stage of it, as the entire pregnancy period is divided into 3 stages, which generally indicates safety or the health of the mother and fetus.. An easy and natural birth, with permission. God. Seeing a circle in a man’s dream. With regard to seeing a circle by a man in a dream, we previously mentioned that seeing a circle symbolizes a woman or refers to the world, and therefore this interpretation applies to seeing a circle by a man, and you should know, dear reader, that the circle In a man’s dream, it symbolizes a woman, and the triangle in a woman’s dream symbolizes a man. Scholars and commentators have stated that seeing a circle in a man’s dream means the perfection of his wife and wife in terms of morals or morals, and perfection, of course, belongs to God Almighty, but what is meant here is for her to be his wife. A degree of beauty and virtue together, and the circle in a man’s dream symbolizes a happy year full of joy and good news, God willing. Signs that indicate that you see the circle in a dream. We agreed that the circle in the dream symbolizes perfection and it is also a call for optimism for the coming days and their events.

title: Detailed interpretation of the police in a dream

preview.html: Detailed interpretation of the police in a dream, interpretation of dreams and visions is of great importance to people who encounter dreams during their sleep and do not know their interpretation or consequences, which prompts them to seek interpretation from experts, including, for example. Dreaming of the police in a dream, the incomprehensible topic that drives them to search for an interpretation, and in this topic we will learn in detail about the interpretation of the police in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the police in a dream by Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi is one of the religious scholars who focused on the science of interpreting dreams and visions, based on his understanding of the narrations of Sharia law and the Holy Qur’an. And the Sunnah of the Prophet, and its interpretation was as follows: It became clear, according to Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation, that the interpretation of the police in a dream means success in an exam that the dreamer is passing. If the sleeper sees that the police are preventing him, this indicates his success in a different matter. It indicates the security that the dreamer experiences. The dream. Seeing a smiling policeman in a dream indicates the dreamer’s need to take care of himself and his family. Whoever sees a policeman in his home, this indicates the safety and security of that home from accidents. Interpretation of a dream about being arrested by the police. The interpretation of a dream about seeing the police in a dream is different from seeing them arresting the dreamer. The interpretation of this topic explains that this dream is a warning to the dreamer, perhaps he is heading towards something wrong. It can be understood from him that he will face several crises in his life, which he can survive or find something to save him from, and this dream is used to correct the path of the dreamer to stay away from the mistake. Trend.Interpretation of seeing the police in a dream for a married and pregnant woman. According to the Muslim scholar Ibn Sirin, there are a number of interpretations related to the interpretation of the police in a dream in detail, and he said in these sayings and opinions the following: There is a great similarity between a single woman and a single woman in dreams, and married women and married and pregnant women seeing the police being interrogated. The dreamer indicates their success in their work. If the dreamer finds that his son is in the hands of the police, this indicates that the son is obedient and righteous. If a person dreams that the police are chasing him, this means that he is idle and inactive in his work. As for escaping from the policeman in the dream, it indicates About an intense fear for the future. What is the interpretation of seeing the police in a dream in detail? After what was previously written and mentioned during our topic, it remains to learn the interpretation of the police in a dream in detail, and the details of this vision are as follows: If a traffic policeman appears in a dream, this indicates the good character of the owner. The dream. The police, army, or guard chasing someone in a dream indicates the dreamer’s arrogance and he must get rid of this bad habit. When a single man sees that the police have arrested him, this indicates that he will marry a woman who is more knowledgeable and wealthy than him. When the policeman appears in his full form In a dream, this indicates the appearance of an employer who is satisfied with the work of the dreamer. Interpretation of dreams is a science that depends on diligence after knowing everything mentioned in the Holy Qur’an and Sunnah, so that diligence is based on knowledge and understanding.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing clothes in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing clothes in a dreamInterpretation of dreams about seeing clothes in a dream, interpretation of dreams about entering a clothing store for singles, interpretation of dreams about changing clothes in a dream, seeing many clothes that differ according to their type, shape, and interpretation. Bad bad situation Also, the interpretation depends on the situation to which the dreamer is associated, because the interpretation of a married person differs from seeing it in a single person’s dream, and this also applies to women. Seeing clothes for a single woman has a different interpretation than seeing clothes for pregnant and married women. Interpretation of seeing clothes by Ibn Sirin: A dream about wearing black clothes is an indication of the student’s new job. Seeing a dead person in a dream wearing black clothes indicates a bad outcome for the deceased. Interpretation of seeing white clothes that A dead person wears it in a dream, and this indicates the good faith of that dead person with God. Interpretation of a dream about clothes by Al-Nabulsi: A dream about buying new clothes in a dream is evidence that the dreamer has traveled temporarily and will return soon. A dream about receiving clothes from someone as a gift from someone in a dream , because this indicates a promotion that he will receive in his field of work. The dream interpretation of seeing clothes for a deceased person in a dream shows the goodness and happiness that this dreamer will obtain. Old and clean clothes in a dream are a sign of the return of long-term relationships, such as the spouses returning to each other or reconciliation with Friends that happened in the past. Seeing a large number of clothes in a dream is a sign of kindness and abundance. Interpretation of seeing clothes by Ibn Shaheen: Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of seeing new clothes worn in a dream and the dreamer was wealthy, because this indicates the prosperity of life. Seeing the clothes of the poor in The dream is a sign of wealth, wealth, and forgiveness of debts and distress. Interpretation of seeing clothes for a single woman: To dream of a virgin girl wearing black clothes is an indication of her strength if she appears elegantly. Interpretation of dirty black clothes in a dream is an indication of the misfortunes that will befall her. Seeing an unmarried girl wearing a dress Black in a dream is a sign of the status and position that you will obtain. Interpretation of seeing missing clothes for unmarried women in a dream, because this indicates good luck. Interpretation of seeing clothes for a pregnant woman: Interpretation of black clothes for a pregnant woman in a dream is evidence of the difficulties she faces and the great stress she is exposed to. Because of childbirth and pregnancy. Dreaming of an elegant dress in a dream for a pregnant woman is a sign of good luck. Seeing dirty black clothes in a dream is evidence of some difficult confrontations that you face during childbirth, when you often get stuck. When you see a pregnant woman buying men’s clothes in a dream, this It indicates the birth of a girl. But if you go to buy women’s clothes, you will give birth to a boy. Interpretation of seeing clothes for a married woman: Seeing clothes in a married woman’s dream indicates the expansion of her scope of living and her good treatment of her husband. Interpretation of clothes in a dream for a married woman is evidence of the stable life in which she lives. The dream Wearing dirty clothes that ruined the woman's dream of secrecy

title: Interpretation of a dream about hitting someone and blood coming out in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about being beaten and the appearance of blood in a dream in order to reach the truth of the dream and interpret it well, which is the jurisprudence of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about hitting someone and blood coming out in a dream. A person’s beating and blood flowing from it may indicate financial crises that the dreamer may face in those days. And in the case of his personal opinion that he was hitting someone Another person and blood dripped from him, this may indicate that he was exposed to some difficulties and problems in his life during those days. In the event that someone believes that he was hitting another person and blood dripped from him, this may indicate that there are some problems in his family life and he must seek help from God. Interpretation of a dream Beating a small crocodile in a dream: Beating a small crocodile in a dream may indicate that he is committing some forbidden acts and sins and must rely on God. In the event that a person sees that he is being beaten by a small crocodile, this may indicate his victory over enemies thanks to God’s grace. If he sees If one hits a small crocodile, this may indicate the challenges that the dreamer faces in his life during those days. Dreaming of hitting a small crocodile in a dream could indicate the achievements that the dreamer has achieved in his life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of hitting a doll in a dream may Anyone who dreams of beating a doll indicates the power of mind and insight control that he has in his life at that time. Beating a doll in a dream can indicate getting rid of problems and difficulties that the dreamer was facing in his life at that time. If one sees that he is hitting the doll, This may indicate the end of a difficult period that the dreamer was going through in his life during those days. It is possible that seeing a doll being beaten in a dream indicates financial crises that the dreamer may face in his life during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about hitting someone who wants to attack me in a dream may indicate Hitting a person who wanted to attack you in a dream signifies abundance and goodness for the dreamer in those days. In case one believes that he was hitting someone who attacked him, this may indicate positive changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during these days. It is possible to see hitting a person who wants to attack you, This indicates that the problems and difficulties that the dreamer faced in his life in those days will be overcome. It is possible to see beatings on whoever wants to attack him, indicating that he overcame some of the obstacles that the dreamer suffered from at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about being beaten in the stomach in a dream: stabbing In the stomach in a dream can indicate a lot of good that will come to the dreamer during this time, and God knows best. If a pregnant woman sees herself stabbed in the stomach with a knife, this may indicate that she will give birth soon and in good health, thanks to God. It is possible to see a stabbed knife in a dream This indicates good things coming to the dreamer and the fulfillment of dreams. Dreaming of a knife in the stomach in a dream can indicate closeness to the Blessed and Most High God, and stop the sins and disobedience that the dreamer committed in the past, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of hitting a hyena in a dream: A dream of hitting hyenas in a dream may indicate The dream is to be close to God Almighty

title: Interpretation of seeing eating sweets in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing sweets by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing sweets in a man’s dream because this dream refers to a beautiful woman. Eating sweets indicates coexistence with women. As for someone who sees in a dream that he is buying sweets, this dream for a single person is a sign of an imminent marriage. As for giving sweets to others, This indicates the emotional state that the viewer is experiencing, and that he enjoys emotional and psychological stability. Ibn Sirin also interpreted seeing sweets in general as indicating profits and a lot of sustenance. Interpretation of seeing sweets in a dream: Buying sweets is a good sign for the pioneer, because it indicates a lot of sustenance and blessings that will come. For the dreamer. Seeing gifts of candy in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that he is giving candy to others, this shows the extent of family cohesion and harmony in the work environment. As for whoever sees himself giving candy to a single person, this indicates his closeness to marriage or engagement. In general, the gift of candy indicates kindness, joy, and pleasure. Seeing sweets and eating them in a dream may indicate success in one’s life and work and great happiness. Seeing sweets in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried woman who sees sweets in a dream, this The dream brings goodness and happiness to the dreamer and may be a sign that you will soon hear happy news. Seeing sweets denotes love and friendship with someone close to her. Eating sweets could be a sign of a close marriage or engagement. Sweets in a dream for a married woman. A married woman sees sweets in a dream. Dreaming that her skin is good and hearing happy news. Eating sweets in a dream can be a sign of good nutrition for her and her husband. Eating sweets indicates the extent of the connection, love and affection between her and her husband. Eating delicious sweets in a dream may indicate that the baby will be a female, and God knows best. Seeing a lot of sweets in a dream, who knows. A dish full of sweets, this indicates a woman’s love for a man. Seeing a lot of sweets can indicate intelligent thinking and positive thinking. It can be a sign of medical coexistence and kind words. title: Interpretation of seeing the narrowness of life in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a close life in a dream for a single woman: Ibn Sirin says in his interpretation: Look at the shortness of life. It is one of the visions that tells about the positive changes that are expected to happen to the pioneer in the coming period of his real life and their clear impact on the life of the dreamer. It also indicates an improvement in the financial and living conditions, and facilitation of... matters, alleviating distress, and overcoming periods of worries and crises. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is suffering from difficulty living in his dream, then most of the interpretations mentioned say about it. It is an indication of what the dreamer may enjoy in the coming period to achieve a distinguished position in the society in which he lives. As a result of his diligence and efforts to achieve that position. Interpretation of anguish and sadness in a dream. An explanation of sadness and sadness in a dream is contrary to what the dreamer imagines, and his heart is sad for him when he sees that in his dream, according to most of what was mentioned in the interpretations of scholars such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, and Al-Nabulsi. Seeing heartache and sadness in a dream can It is a result of what affects the dreamer in his real life, because he does not complete some things, or his loss to a close friend, or other things that cause him problems and anxiety. Anxiety and sadness in a dream. Ibn Sirin said that it is a sign of joy and happiness that the dreamer expects to receive in the coming period of his life. The truth. It is also evidence of the abundance of sustenance, the luxury of life, the blessing of money, and the multiple sources of lawful livelihood as mentioned in Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation. It is also interpreted as a reference to atonement for sins and the cleansing of the dreamer’s soul from the consequences of the transgressions and sins that he committed in the last period of his life. The real thing. Seeing sadness in a dream for single people. The issue of seeing a sad single woman in her dream. She feels sad because of a specific person, because it shows that she is emotionally connected to this person. And that this sadness will be translated into joy and communication in the near future, God willing. Seeing sadness in an unmarried woman’s dream also means getting rid of The fears and problems that she faced in the recent period. The beginning of a new phase characterized by calm and psychological stability as a result of the collapse of worries. This dream for an unmarried woman is also interpreted as good news for getting rid of the sorrows and problems that may have arisen between her and her fiancé. Interpretation of a dream about becoming poor. Seeing poverty in a dream has many meanings. It is interpreted the opposite of what the dreamer sees in his dream. In most of its interpretations, it appears that the dreamer’s life is full of giving and kindness. It indicates the wealth that the dreamer will enjoy in the next period of her real life. For many reasons, such as obtaining a new job with a higher income or being promoted to a position Prestigious. Seeing her in pain means poverty, and others ask her for help, showing that she is one of the people to whom people respond to blessings and supplications. Ibn Sirin says that whoever sees in her dream that she has become poor, this is evidence of kindness, giving, and a lot of kindness to the dreamer, and that God will suffice him if he asks and humbles their need. Interpretation A poor man’s dream: Seeing a poor man helping him in a dream is considered one of the good visions that indicate in its meaning the arrival of abundant goodness.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a girl kissing a girl on the mouth

preview.html: Interpretation of a girl kissing a single girl: Ibn Shirin sees that seeing a girl kissing a girl and another on her mouth shows that the strength of the relationship between them and God is higher and He knows best. If an unmarried woman dreams of kissing another girl, this vision means that she will get married soon, God willing. But if she sees that someone kissed her on the mouth This dream indicates the arrival of kindness and abundant nourishment. If a married man kisses a girl on the mouth in a dream, this indicates the death of worries and sorrows and almost relief for her. Interpretation of seeing a woman kissing in a dream If a man kisses his wife in a dream, this vision indicates family stability and family happiness, and God knows best. Seeing someone kissing a girl on the neck, this vision is undesirable and indicates the dreamer’s sexual desire. If the dreamer sees that someone he knows is kissing him in a dream, this symbolizes reconciliation and the end of disputes and problems by the command of God Almighty. See the point Kiss In a dream, the dreamer changes his life for the better and achieves great success in life. His workplace. Interpretation of a dream about hugging and kissing: Seeing an unmarried woman kissing a girl on the cheek in a dream indicates his wrong behavior and his distance from God - Glory be to Him. If he did: A girl kisses his friend in the dream, this vision shows the common interests between them and God Glory be to Him. But if he kisses a dead woman In his dream, it means that he will be blessed with good luck and live it, God willing. Seeing an unmarried girl being kissed by someone she does not know in a dream means that she will hear good news in the coming period. Interpretation of seeing a woman kissing a married woman in a dream If he sees a married / married person kissing her in a dream This vision indicates the end of worries and sorrows and the release of distress. Seeing a kiss in a married woman’s dream symbolizes love, tenderness, and compassion between her and the one who receives it, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. But if she sees that her husband kisses her in the dream, this indicates the strength of love, understanding, and bonding between the spouses. Kissing A married woman: In her dream, this indicates the coming of goodness, abundance of livelihood, and abundance of money for her, her husband, and his family, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a woman kissing a woman in a dream about a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees her husband kissing her stomach in a dream, it means that she will give birth to a child with beautiful features. Seeing a kiss in a pregnant woman’s dream It indicates the marital happiness that she will enjoy in her life, and God is the Most High, the All-Knowing. Seeing a pregnant woman and someone kissing her in her dream is a sign of affection, love, and mercy between this woman and the person who kissed her. Seeing yourself kissing a pregnant woman in a dream indicates that she is approaching her due date, and the ease of childbirth and safety for her and her child. Interpretation of seeing a dead person being kissed in a dream. If anyone sees this kissing the dead in a dream, this means that the dreamer received a large inheritance from the dead before his death. If the dreamer sees that he is kissing a dead person he knows in a dream, then this dream indicates the arrival of kindness and sufficient sustenance. But In the event that he receives a dead person whom he does not know, this means that the fortuneteller will achieve his goals that he was trying to achieve. They symbolize watching a dead man kissing a deceased person in a dream.

title: I dreamed that I became a head of state in a dream

preview.html: I dreamed that I became a head of state in a dream. Dreams can have a meaning in reality, so we ask what our dreams mean, and below we present a dream that I became a head of state in a dream..I dreamed that I became a head of state in a dream. I dreamed that I became a head of state in a dream. It may be an indication of the position that he will reach, God willing. When a married man sees himself as a president, this may be a sign of his obtaining a high position, and God knows the unseen. If a young man sees that he has become a head of state, this may lead to him obtaining a high position, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees himself At the head of a state, it may express that he is an ambitious person and seeks to achieve his goals, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about marrying a head of state in a dream: Interpretation of a dream about marrying a head of state in a dream could be an indication of his high position, and where if an unmarried girl sees marriage to a head of state This may lead her to a high position, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. It may also indicate excellence in study or work, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about marrying the king’s daughter in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about marrying the king’s daughter. In a dream, seeing a wedding with the sultan’s daughter with musicians and kayakers can It indicates alcohol or what it does, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees himself marrying a woman, this may indicate money, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees marrying a king, this may be a sign of marrying a man of high status, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream that I became A high official in a dream. Interpretation of dreaming that I have become a high employee in a dream, and seeing that I have become a manager can indicate a promotion, as he can express his promotion at work, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself receiving a high position in a dream, this may be a sign of good changes, and God knows best. It also expresses obtaining a job, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a conversation with the president of the state in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about talking with the president of the state in a dream could be an indication of the fulfillment of desires, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. In the event that a young man sees himself speaking with the president in a dream, this may be evidence of the fulfillment of desires. Goals, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees the president happy, it may indicate the situation he is going through, and God knows best. When you see talking to the head of state, you may reach a high position, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about kissing the head of state in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about kissing the head of state in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations of the vision. The president accepts. However, seeing a righteous ruler may represent an upright judge and father, and God knows best. When you see an unjust ruler, it may express exposure to injustice, and God knows the unseen. Also, seeing the president in a dream may indicate happiness and closeness to God, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of my husband’s dream about becoming a head of state in a dream. Interpretation of the dream That my husband becomes a head of state in a dream could be evidence of him attaining a high position, and God knows best. When a dreamer sees someone becoming a head of state in a dream, this may be an indication of a high position,

title: What is the interpretation of seeing the full moon falling in a dream?

preview.html: Trend website provides you with the complete interpretation of seeing the moon falling in a dream. The falling moon in our dreams may be something to some people. Therefore, we present to you, dear followers, all the ingredients and meanings so that you can learn about the interpretation of this dream, which can cause great confusion and anxiety among some dreamers, and we have also collected for you everything related to it. What is the interpretation of seeing the full moon falling in a dream for women, married women, and pregnant women, as well as for men with great scholars who interpret dreams and visions and through experts in the sciences of interpretation and jurisprudence. Seeing the moon falling in a dream by Ibn SirinThe great scholar Ibn Sirin explained to us that seeing the moon falling in a dream is full of visions indicating... Goodness, comfort and abundance. He pointed out that seeing the moon falling completely onto the earth in a dream, and the earth expanding with light, is good news for comfort, peace and joy. Seeing the moon falling into the river is one of the visions that indicate wars and problems that will be solved and eliminated with insight. What is it? Interpretation of seeing the moon falling in a dream for an ordinary woman? The interpretation of seeing the moon falling in a dream is complete for a woman who has a bowl of visions that indicate that she is suffering from some problems and difficulties in her life. The falling full moon in a dream is a sign of liberation from problems and worries, a sign of kindness, and freedom from Adversity, relief from distress. Seeing the full moon falling in a dream means that the girl will get rid of some evil in her life and a sign of her leaving her lover. What is the interpretation of the falling moon for a married woman? What is the interpretation of seeing the moon falling in a full dream for a married woman from visions showing marital problems Which she suffers from with her husband and his family. Seeing the moon falling on a woman’s house in her dream is evidence of many problems and obstacles and a sign of the annulment and dissolution of marriage and a sign of divorce. Also, dreaming of the full moon falling into the sea is a sign of good luck and a great source of sustenance for one’s life, and a sign On comfort and freedom from all troubles. What is the interpretation of the moon falling to a pregnant woman? Interpretation scholars stated that the moon falling in a pregnant woman’s dream is one of the dreams that does not portend harm, as it is evidence of a trouble-free birth. Seeing the moon falling to the ground and destroying roads and property means that you will suffer It is a major problem in pregnancy and childbirth and may affect the loss of the fetus, and God knows best. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, write it in a comment below and a team of experts will contact you as soon as possible.
